events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and our team is excited to review your qualifications closely.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further review by our developer hiring team.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering positions has been assigned to guide you through the interview process and answer any questions you may have.
The initial screening call was completed successfully where we discussed your background, technical experience, and career goals in detail.
Thank you for promptly responding to our initial screening invitation and providing additional information to support your candidacy.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior engineering team for May 10th at 2 PM UTC; please prepare for coding and system design questions.
